A

attributeIndicesTipText() - Method in class weka.core.DilcaDistance
Returns the tip text for this property.

D

DilcaDistance - Class in weka.core
Implementing the Dilca function for categorical distance computation.

In particular this is the implememntation of the non parametric version of the Dilca distance function.
DilcaDistance() - Constructor for class weka.core.DilcaDistance
